title: baala gOpaala krishhNa
sahitya:
bAlA - gOpAla krishNa pAhi



anupallavi



nIla mEga sarira - nityanandam dEhi



caraNam 1



kalapa sundarAga mana

kastUri gopigAnana

naLina daLa vEga nayana 

nanda nandanA 

vinuta gOpa vasu jana 

nIlanda gOpi mOhana 

dalita samsara bandaNa 

dAruga vai nAsanA 

(bAla)



caraNam 2



viSvakta pAdAravinda 

viSva vandita mukundA 

satya akanda bODananda 

sarjita nanDA sunanDA 

satya stAbita vEdAnanda 

pAlita nanDA gOvindA 

viSwata nArAyana thIrta 

nirmala Ananda gOvinda

(bAlA)
